title: cardbased
extract: In this type of solutions, the definition of bonus buy promotion may include a defined condition of scanning the card. ... In the definition of promotion, you can also define the method of granting benefits in the form of points or electronic money allocated to the card account.
extract_html: In this type of solutions, the definition of bonus buy promotion may include a defined condition of scanning the card. ... In the definition of promotion, you can also define the method of granting benefits in the form of points or electronic money allocated to the card account.
